reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's colors and find it very soft and well-made. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some appreciate the oversized fit, others note it's not as long as shown in pictures. The material quality and skin irritation also get mixed reviews, with several customers reporting the material is itchy to the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely stunning!
items.body: I’m absolutely obsessed with this sweater! It’s gorgeous and so freaking soft! It fits perfect. I’m 5’5” and weigh around 132 and I got a medium and it’s perfect! And the colors through it are so vibrant! Read more
items.author: Michelle McElvain

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Colors are so pretty
items.body: This sweater is so pretty! Soft and not scratchy, and the colors are vibrant. The sleeves are a wider sleeve and the length was just below my waist like so not exactly crop. I ordered in medium from reviews, I’m 5’3” and 138 lbs and I could have easily done a small. I think I’ll wash and dry once and may like the fit ever better Read more
items.author: Jess

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Review on this sweater
items.body: Love the quality. Love the sizing. Love the softness. Only reason why I didn't give it more stars is it's a crop top. It is not as long as the picture shows, And I do not have a long torso Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft sweater
items.body: Very soft and love all the colors in it. Fits nice and good quality product. Read more
items.author: Elaine Langham

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Crop top, huge sleeves
items.body: I was so disappointed because the fit is nothing like the picture. The arms are huge and super long and the cut is actually more of a crop top. It looks so cute in the photo but unfortunately it was not what I was expecting at all. Read more
items.author: Olivia Ackman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Worth the Compliments
items.body: Love this sweater and tons of compliments. Very soft and warm. The colors are perfect and the size is accurate. It has washed beautifully. Read more
items.author: Tracy Kram

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater, but was itchy.
items.body: I love the color combination, but was disappointed with the material. It wasn’t plush. I bought a size small since it was oversized. It fit good, but I was disappointed with the material quality. I returned. Read more
items.author: Mar

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater, sleeve cuffs are a little wide
items.body: This is a really beautiful sweater, very well made. The stripes are woven into the fabric, and very pretty. We only gave it four stars because the cuffs on the sleeves seem to be a little wide, so the whole sleeve falls forward. It's not a deal-breaker though, we just roll it up a couple rolls and it's perfectly fine. Read more
items.author: EmmEllBee

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Blue, Yellow, Apricot, Black, Grey, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
